alert.note: Alert for Bon Homme; Clay; Hutchinson; Lincoln; Minnehaha; Turner; Yankton (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 03 at 2:04AM MST until January 04 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of 5 to 13 inches and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northwest Iowa, southwest Minnesota and southeast South Dakota. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour are possible through Tuesday morning, producing near-zero visibility at times. Small fluctuations in storm track are still possible, which could impact the forecast precipitation type and amounts.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bon Homme; Clay; Hutchinson; Lincoln; Minnehaha; Turner; Yankton
